page.title: 02POPULATION SURVEY
page.content: We also conducted a questionaire in the{Weeley}and{Weeley Heath}area. From this we were able to deduce the following facts: {22%}of the inhabitants have lived there all their lives. {54%}of the inhabitants (not including those who have lived there all their lives) have lived there for ten years or more. {94%}of the inhabitants enjoy living there for various reasons such as the rural area, peaceful countryside and privacy. Those who disliked it did so because of poor availability of public transport or problems with stubble burning or chemical sprays. {42%}of the inhabitants are retired (this is reflected by the fact that{ {76%}of the inhabitants have lived there ten years or more). {8%}of inhabitants are unemployed.
